title: Vel'Koz skin animation bug (gameplay)
body:
The arclight vel'koz skin has a bug with his tentacle animation, especially when he is running (like with the homeguard speed boost). Sometimes, his tentacles fail to move or even move around erraticly in random directions. I own the battlecast skin as well and i have noticed this issue only occasionally with the homeguard enchantment but i am pretty sure it has something to deal with that skin's respawn animation as when i wait a little bit and do not leave the fountain immediately, his tentacles animate as they are supposed to.

Steps to replicate:
1. use velkoz's arclight skin (or battlecast)
2. purchase boots with the homeguard enchantment
3. leave the fountain after the homeguard passive is proced immediately after returning to the fountain

Occurrence rate: roughly 95% with the arclight skin, the battlecast skin has a much lower chance of occurrence, around 5%

i love velkoz's tentacle animation but it does look a bit strange when this bug does occur and they don't move at all. The arclight skin is so beautiful but this bug makes me prefer his bc skin over it as i often buy homeguard on vel

replies.body:
Hiya Gespe,

Thanks for the report! We'll see if we can get Vel'Koz to learn how to run better in Homeguards. :]
